job.title: Insurance Sales Agent
job.description: ltpgtIf you live in the Charlotte Region and surrounding areas and dont have the following at your disposal you owe it to yourself to contact me today to have a confidential conversationltpgtltpgtFree marketing support free exclusive directmail and telemarketing leads from interested consumers handed out weekly We will get you in front of far moreampnbspampnbsppeople than you are currently seeingltpgtltpgtFree training office space desk phone admin support CRM business cards etc No hidden feesltpgtltpgt165 Insurance carriers including many of the nations top insurance companies This allows for the best possible solution for each clients individual needampnbspYou will always be able to do the BEST job for your clientsampnbspWe offer Index Annuities Life Insurance Medicare LTC Dental Hospital Indemnity etcltpgtltpgtOwnership of your renewals overwrites and clientsltpgtltpgtAgents receive top level payouts significantly higher than most Career AgenciesltpgtltpgtThis is the support we offer agents at American Insurance Marketing SolutionsampnbspAll of this is providedampnbspampnbspfree of charge with no hidden costs deducted from your paycheck every week Email or call me if you are interested in a confidential interview  Email trippgoaimsnet or Call 9803330003ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
